data.title: Mahesh Bhatt: Unfortunate End to Preity Zinta, Ness Wadia's Love Story
data.meta_description: Filmmaker Mahesh Bhatt on Saturday called the souring of Preity Zinta and Ness Wadia's "love story" into a "hate story", "unfortunate" after the actress accused her former beau and industrialist of molestation.
data.text:
Mahesh Bhatt said Preity Zinta and Ness Wadia's love story had turned into a hate story

Highlights

Filmmaker Mahesh Bhatt on Saturday called the souring of Preity Zinta and Ness Wadia's "love story" into a "hate story", "unfortunate" after the actress accused her former beau and industrialist of molestation.

"A fairy tale love story turns into a hate story! What an unfortunate end to the Priety Zinta Ness Wadia romance," tweeted Mr Bhatt, who co-wrote the 1999 film Sangharsh which starred Preity Zinta.

Ms Zinta lodged a written complaint against the Bombay Dyeing scion with the Marine Drive police station on Thursday night. She is said to have accused him of grabbing her hand and abusing her during a cricket match held in Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium on May 30.

Mr Wadia, who co-owns the the Kings XI Punjab IPL team with the actress, has denied the allegations, terming them "totally false and baseless".

The duo reportedly started dating in 2005, and their relationship came to an end in 2009.
